mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cart where userId = '${userId}'

select p.goodsNo as goodsNo ,p.goodsName as goodsName ,c.goodsQty as goodsQty ,p.goodsPrice as goodsPrice ,p.goodsCategory as goodsCategory ,p.goodsImgPath as goodsImgPath from cart c, goods p where p.goodsNo = c.goodsNo and c.userId = '${userId}';
mapper.insert: insert into cart (userId, goodsNo, goodsName, goodsCategory, goodsPrice, goodsQty) values (#{userId}, #{goodsNo}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsCategory}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsQty});
